授業目的: The objective of this class is to have students enjoy studying English while improving their ability to express themselves in English.
到達目標:
1. Practice everyday conversation
2. Read and understand the book
3. Create a unique project related to the book
授業方法:
This class is online. Please check your school email for details about Zoom and Google Classrooms.
③オンデマンドA型オンライン授業(時間割設定あり)/③Online format: On-demand A type (with timetable)
